title: EU pushes to hasten start of Japan trade deal
text:
EU pushes to hasten start of Japan trade deal 12:32pm EDT - 01:24 
The European Commission has put forward a proposed free-trade agreement with Japan for fast-track approval, hoping to avoid a repeat of the public protests that nearly derailed a trade pact with Canada two years ago. As Laura Frykberg reports, the move is being seen as a rejection of the protectionist stance of President Trump.
